Hi @abenmao,
I have looked at your implementation, which helps me a lot to develop my optimizer. But I have some questions:

  1. If I set global_step variable with your model_average_device_setter, the variable will be re-set to worker device, right?
  2. Do you think it is import or not to get global training loss/accuracy in training process? Since we can not get those through your implementation.
  3. Did you test the convergence using model average with momentum in CNN based model? Since MA with momentum performed badly in my test.

body:
Hi @abenmao,
I have looked at your implementation, which helps me a lot to develop my optimizer. But I have some questions:
1) If I set global_step variable with your model_average_device_setter, the variable will be re-set to worker device, right?
2) Do you think it is import or not to get global training loss/accuracy in training process? Since we can not get those through your implementation.
3) Did you test the convergence using model average with momentum in CNN based model? Since MA with momentum performed badly in my test.
